description: Try our easy to follow Diced Beetroot Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Relish,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Apple,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Beetroot,Peanut free
name: Diced Beetroot Relish Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 425g can diced beetroot, drained and liquid reserved
1 granny smith apple, peeled and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, apple and vinegar in a food processor and process until smooth, scraping down sides 2-3 times during processing. Remove to a medium saucepan.
Stir in reserved liquid from beetroot, caster sugar, salt and mixed spice. Bring to the boil, stirring continuously. Reduce heat to medium, cover and simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Remove lid and cook for a further 10 minutes until thick and pulpy, stirring occasionally. Stir in Edgell Beetroot and cook for a further 10 minutes.
